list.name: Combo Solo 1
list.description: 1 cup Dalgona +  2 dough Croffle original + 1 dalgona dipping sauce (When placing an order, please include a note in the information column specifying your preferred Dalgona drink and dipping sauce flavor)

list.name: Combo Solo 2
list.description: 1 cup Regular iced +  2 dough Croffle original + 1 dalgona dipping sauce (When placing an order, please include a note in the information column specifying your preferred regular iced drink and dipping sauce flavor)

list.name: Combo Duo 1

list.name: Combo Duo 2
list.description: 2 cup Regular iced +  3 dough Croffle original + 1 dalgona dipping sauce (When placing an order, please include a note in the information column specifying your preferred regular iced drink and dipping sauce flavor)

list.name: Combo Trio 1
list.description: 3 cup Dalgona +  5 dough Croffle original + 2 dalgona dipping sauce (When placing an order, please include a note in the information column specifying your preferred Dalgona drink and dipping sauce flavor)

list.name: Combo Trio 2
list.description: 3 cup Regular iced +  5 dough Croffle original + 2 dalgona dipping sauce (When placing an order, please include a note in the information column specifying your preferred regular iced drink and dipping sauce flavor)
